name: Jetpack SNES
description:
Controls: Space -  Use jetpack
Right Shift - Use speical suit's abillities This game is very incomplete, didn't have the motivation to finish polishing it What's Jetpack SNES?

Jetpack SNES is a remake of the classic mobile game Jetpack Joyride, which me and i assume a lot of others grown to love in our childhood, at the starting era of mobile games.

Incase you don't know what Jetpack Joyride is, you basically need to avoid the obstacles that come your way, and collect coins to unlock more upgrades, among other stuff.

This is my first time trying to make a game that is endless and that doesn't just defy on levels, and despite how bad it still is, i'm glad i at least tried something out of my comfort zone of just leveling the entire game.

Jam Details

This was made for the Retro Jam! (https://itch.io/jam/retro-jam-2021)

The theme was "Side Effects", and the way i incoporated the theme was that you can unlock custom jetpack suits that give you various effects!
